ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and International 3G compatibility via 900/2100 HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Windows Mobile 6.1 with TouchFLO 3D interface responds perfectly to your finger gestures when scrolling through contacts, browsing the web, and launching media
3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder; 4 GB of internal memory; Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g); Bluetooth 2.0 connectivity for handsfree communication and stereo music; GPS mapping and directions,Up to 5.5 hours of talk time, up to 285 hours (11+ days) of standby time
PLS NOTE : THIS PHONE DOESNT SUPPORT ATT NETWORK. ONLY T-MOBILE AND EURO AND ASIAN NETWORK.
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Touch Diamond [TIM MOBILE Unlocked - GSM TRIBAND 900/1800/1900Mhz] Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, MP3/Video Player, and Windows Mobile 6.1--International Version with No Warranty (Black)
